document_data.name: Sea Ward of Waterdeep
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sea Ward of Waterdeep''' was the wealthiest ward in [[Waterdeep]] and located in the northwest of the city.
document_data.Geography:
The ward was delimited by the [[Trollwall]] on the north and west, by [[Julthoon Street]] to the south, and by [[Shield Street]] to the east, extending to the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] north of [[Vondil Street]].

The ward contained the [[Field of Triumph]], [[Heroes' Garden]] and the [[Sea's Edge Beach]].
document_data.History: The Sea Ward was officially included as one of the official wards of Waterdeep in the {{YearlinkName|1276}}, together with the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]].
